title: Can the Longhorns become a CFP threat?
description:
Wendi Nix, Tom Luginbill, and Sam Acho discuss the Longhorns' expectations and storylines for the 2022 season, including their wide margin of preseason rankings and their intriguing QB battle, as well as some other teams that could surprise the experts this fall. Plus, with just 9 days left until the season kicks off, the crew takes a look at some teams who already bringing the energy for this season.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:subtitle: CFB Live: The crew discusses Texas and other teams that could exceed expectations
